content: I'm excited to hear that you're considering using your naturally dyed yarn to create a unique and special quilt. Since we were discussing seam finishing methods earlier, I wanted to ask: Have you thought about how you'll finish the seams on your quilt, especially since you're working with velvet and lace? Do you think the zigzag stitch method we discussed earlier would work well with the naturally dyed yarn and fabrics you're using?
